segments.pli: “Kimatthiyaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, samaṇe gotame brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti?
segments.en: “Reverend Sāriputta, what’s the purpose of living the spiritual life with the ascetic Gotama?”

segments.pli: “Dukkhassa kho, āvuso, pariññatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti.
segments.en: “The purpose of living the spiritual life under the Buddha is to completely understand suffering.”

segments.pli: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā etassa dukkhassa pariññāyā”ti?
segments.en: “But, reverend, is there a path and a practice for completely understanding this suffering?”

segments.pli: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etassa dukkhassa pariññāyā”ti?
“Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā, etassa dukkhassa pariññāyā”ti?
“Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, etassa dukkhassa pariññāya, seyyathidaṃ—
Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā etassa dukkhassa pariññāyā”ti.
“Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā, etassa dukkhassa pariññāya.
